abstract: A discouraging employment report revived fears among investors that the nation may already be in a recession.
snippet: A discouraging employment report revived fears among investors that the nation may already be in a recession.
lead_paragraph: Stocks slid on Wall Street on Friday as investors digested a discouraging employment report that revived fears the nation may already be in a recession.

headline.main: Stocks Slide on Renewed Fears of Recession
